title: Apple security advisory (AV25-593)
description: On September 15, 2025, Apple published security updates to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: iOS and iPadOS  versions prior to 26
iOS and iPadOS  versions prior to 18.7
iOS and iPadOS  versions prior to 16.7.12
iOS and iPadOS  versions prior to 15.8.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
